comment: I had Professor Hance for KSU 1101, and she definitely made the class very enjoyable. She is tons of fun and she will make you laugh a lot. Her tests are straight off the powerpoints she lectures from in class. Overall, an easy class with a really fun teacher!

Take her!!! I'm super picky about teachers and this one is by far a winner. She's extremely helpful even if it doesn't have to do with her class and she's much more entertaining in class than other professors. She's kinda wacky in a good way and she likes to have fun. easy tests too as long as you skim the book reading.

Awesome teacher! Very interesting, keeps attention. Usually got to leave class early. Uses the textbook, a lot. Totally would get her again, just make sure to study for the tests... even if you think they are easy...
Amazing Teacher!!! Funny and really loves her jobs!! Makes spanish easy to learn and understand. I would recommend her for sure!!!

I have her for KSU 1101 this semester. She is wonderful and keeps me laughing all class long! She makes things funny which makes me want to come to class. I am hopefully going to be a Spanish minor and I hope to have her there too!

Hance is absolutely AMAZING! She is hilarious and an extremely good teacher!I would recommend her to anyone. She always says, "If I could learn Spanish, so can you." She holds a weekly study group for anyone and is always available to give you extra help if you need it. Tests are tricky but they are like that bc of the department. Take her!!!
